data.comment: The match has started at Den Dreef Stadium.
Maxime D'Arpino for Oostende has been booked by Bert Put and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 35, Goal! Kristiyan Malinov gives Oud-Heverlee a 1-0 lead in Heverlee.
Casper De Norre instrumental with a fine assist.
Ari Skulason (Oostende) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Den Dreef Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Den Dreef Stadium.
Robbie D'Haese is replacing Ari Skulason for Oostende at Den Dreef Stadium.
In the minute 59, Arthur Theate (Oostende) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Maxime D'Arpino with an assist there.
Makhtar Gueye scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 1-2 at Den Dreef Stadium.
In the minute 72, Great play from Fashion Sakala to set up the goal.
Jelle Bataille is booked for the away team.
The away team replace Makhtar Gueye with Mamadou Thiam.
In the minute 80, Oud-Heverlee make their first substitution with Mathieu Maertens replacing Thibault Vlietinck.
The home team have replaced Kristiyan Malinov with Moussa Al-Taamari. This is the second substitution made today by Marc Brys.
Pierre-Yves Ngawa (Oud-Heverlee) has received a yellow card from Bert Put.
In the minute 87, Francois Marquet is on a sub for Kevin Vandendriessche for Oostende.
Daan Vekemans is replacing Casper De Norre for the home team.
Marc Brys (Oud-Heverlee) is making a fourth substitution, with Olivier Myny replacing Kamal Sowah.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
